head.description: A web developer at your service for a project to your expectations ! 💻

footer.title: Let’s talk about your next project ! 🚀

about.title: Who am I?
about.description:
Hi 👋 ! I’m Matteo, a FullStack developer for over {{yearsExperience}} years.

Originally set on becoming an architect, my passion for web development emerged during the lockdown, strengthened by a Bachelor’s degree at the IIM and a Master’s at HETIC. I have honed my technical skills and aesthetic sensibility. 💻

It all started with OpenClassrooms. The first site you turn to when you’re interested in the web!

Today, as a freelancer, I create a variety of custom projects for my clients. 🚀

My attention to detail, precision, and aesthetic approach allow me to deliver elegant and efficient solutions.

My philosophy? “Clean code is worth 10” 😉

success.title: Message sent ! 🚀
success.text: Thank you for reaching out. I will get back to you within 2 days. In the meantime, you can check out my other projects or explore my site.
